title: User Token Claim Schema
description: Defines the claims provided to autenticate a user with a JWT.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: Users can either be authenticated or unauthenticated. Authenticated users have had their identity validated. Unauthenticated users have not proved their identity, can still take actions when enabled in SaaSquatch, but are tracked separately.

sub.title: Subject
sub.description: The user identity to be validated. Of the format: `{ACCOUNTID}:{USERID}@{TENANT}:users`
